fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack another player at night.
- Attack a random player who visits you this night.
- At night, permanently disguise yourself as any role.
- Roleblock another player through immunity tonight.
- Reduce another player's attack to None and their defense to Vulnerable tonight.
- At night, opt to secretly double your voting power in the following day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Control, redirection, roleblock, detection immune
- Your abilities and attributes cannot be copied, changed, or removed.
- You survive the first hang attempt against you.
- At any time, you may pay <@298205270201597955> $500 to turn this post into a positive-numbered one.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be part of the last 3 living players. Aside from other neutrals who have fulfilled their win condition, only you will win, and the game ends immediately.
